answers.answer: It sounds to me that you do not have any problem at all. So you can't get an erection through fantasies alone? So what? If you keep fretting like this you will give yourself a problem.

question: Hello,Brief: 38y, male, very low free testosterone (only 30-40), pre diabetes, 6 feet, 303 LBS, doing 1 hour cardio/day, wieght lifting 3times/week,  losing 1 pound per week, small varicocele above left testi, some hidroceles with water in scortum, no infection,  broken up with girlfriend 6 months ago, a little depressed, sleep Abnia.Problem: high sex drive mentally, frequent masturbation (4/week),normal erection with physical stimulation, but no erection by visual stimulation or mental fantasiesI know a man like me is qualified to have sexual problem, but I wanna know which of these factors is more related to my specific erection problem.Thank you
title: I can not get erection by visual or mental stimulation
